participant_1.name: Mark Johnson
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and caring, Mark is dedicated to his job and values the companionship of his pets. He has a nurturing side, often reflecting on the lessons from his father.
participant_1.background: i am a construction worker. i've 5 cats. my cats are very special to me. my dad taught me everything i know.

participant_2.name: Sarah Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and open-minded, Sarah is proud of her military service and enjoys exploring different cultures through food. She has a down-to-earth attitude and values family history.
participant_2.background: i did not graduate high school. my favourite food is shawarma. i am in the army. my grandfather served in world war a.

content.text: This is your profile. During the dialog pretend to be this person

i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures.
i am an elementary school teacher.
i am fluent in english spanish and french.
